name: susam-components
description: Component library for Ekol Logistics OneOrder
author: Ekol Logistics OneOrder Engineering Team

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:babel && npm run build:create-package
scripts.pack: npm run build && cd build && npm pack && mv susam-components* ../
scripts.pack:test: rm -f ../pack-test/susam-components*.tgz && npm run pack && mv susam-components*.tgz ../pack-test/ && cd ../pack-test/ && npm install susam-components*.tgz
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && npm run build && cd build && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && npm run build && cd build && npm publish
